definition: ridgepole/ridgepole and beams/person able to bear heavy responsibility/mainstay (of organization)/pillar (of state)

sentences.english: When they grow up, they are not only the social elites, but also our national backbone.
sentences.chinese: 他们长大了不仅是社会的精英，也是国家的栋梁。

sentences.english: Bully local ruffians and hooligans, are pillars of the nation.
sentences.chinese: 混混地痞流氓，都是国家栋梁。

sentences.english: The day necessarily will become a pillars just, don't know two how under the idea?
sentences.chinese: 日必将成为栋梁之才，不知二位意下如何？

sentences.english: So he built the temple and completed it, roofing it with beams and cedar planks.
sentences.chinese: 所罗门建殿，安置香柏木的栋梁，又用香柏木板遮盖。

sentences.english: Mixes the local ruffians , that is the national pillar of the state.
sentences.chinese: 混混地痞流氓，那是国家栋梁。

sentences.english: Actor-director Jiang Wen is a pillar of the Chinese film industry.
sentences.chinese: 演员兼导演姜文是中国电影界的栋梁。

sentences.english: Some say that college students have the knowledge to understand cultural, they will be national leaders in the future.
sentences.chinese: 有人说，大学生有知识，懂文化，是国家栋梁。

sentences.english: You've been a great asset to our department.
sentences.chinese: 你曾经是我们部门的栋梁之材。

sentences.english: Such men are the backbone of the country.
sentences.chinese: 这样的人是国家的栋梁。

sentences.english: Is fragrant peaches and plums, tomorrow are the pillars of society, to set off the waves.
sentences.chinese: 是桃李芬芳，明天是社会的栋梁，要掀起腾飞的巨浪。

sentences.english: If Cao Dongliang and Zhang Lin study English well, they will understand me.
sentences.chinese: 如果曹栋梁和张林学好英语，他们会明白我的意思。

sentences.english: Tree, alive is a beautiful landscape, and died of it is still a pillar.
sentences.chinese: 树，活着是美丽的风景，死了依然是栋梁之才。

sentences.english: Such men are the spine of the nation.
sentences.chinese: 这样的人是国家的栋梁。

sentences.english: Today's seedling, tomorrow will be national pillars just.
sentences.chinese: 今天的幼苗，明天就会成为国家的栋梁之才。

sentences.english: Subterranean party assassinates the task that traitor Su Chun comes to to fall on Liu pillar body.
sentences.chinese: 地下党暗杀汉奸苏春来的任务落在了刘栋梁身上。

sentences.english: Piston type accumulator with a horizontal connection unit ensures lower pressure wastage and fast reaction.
sentences.chinese: 活塞式蓄能器，配以栋梁式压射系统。

definition: to make sth of oneself/to become a person who is worthy of respect
to bend to a task and spare no effort (idiom); striving to the utmost
good timber/sound material/fig. able person/sound chap
to bring peace and stability to the country
to have a future full of promise
It takes ten years to nurture a tree, but a hundred years to train a man (idiom). A good education program takes a long time to develop.

definition: splendor shines on the family's door (idiom)/fig. to bring honor to one's family
